chapter.title: JMS Monitor - org.csstudio.debugging.jmsmonitor
chapter.para: The JMS Monitor is a utility for monitoring raw JMS messages. It is a debug tool for developers.
Under its preferences, configure the appropriate JMS connection URL, see .
After entering a JMS Topic like LOG, ALARM, TALK etc., it will display received messages. It is possible to enter a list of comma-separated topics.
For more, refer to its online help.
